test.name: TEST-DEF-01610
test.description: Define a system with four partitions where the same software trap in each partition raises a distinct recovery action: P0 : ignore P1 : partition warm start P2 : partition cold start P3 : idle. Check that the configured action is properly executed in each partition.

teststep.description: TSAL_INIT; set partition mode to NORMAL; expect NO_ERROR.
TSAL_INIT; set partition mode to NORMAL; expect NO_ERROR.
TSAL_INIT; set partition mode to NORMAL; expect NO_ERROR.
TSAL_INIT; set partition mode to NORMAL; expect NO_ERROR.
Generate sw trap. Expect an Health Monitor event was generated with error PMK_VIOL_ERR.
Obtain partition operating mode (via GET_PARTITION_STATUS); verify OPERATING_MODE == NORMAL.
Generate sw trap. Expect an Health Monitor event was generated with error PMK_VIOL_ERR.
Generate sw trap. Expect an Health Monitor event was generated with error PMK_VIOL_ERR.
Generate sw trap. Expect an Health Monitor event was generated with error PMK_VIOL_ERR.
Obtain partition operating mode of P1 (via GET_A_PARTITION_STATUS); verify OPERATING_MODE == WARM_START.
Obtain partition operating mode of P2 (via GET_A_PARTITION_STATUS); verify OPERATING_MODE == COLD_START.
Obtain partition operating mode of P3 (via GET_A_PARTITION_STATUS); verify OPERATING_MODE == IDLE.
